bcr 0.1.1.9

  • Changelog

Reference

get_today()

Latest daily variation of Moroccan stocks

Intra-day price variation

Easy access to the price changes that occured for the provided company stock or Market Indices (MASI and MADEX).

intraday() intradays()

Intraday Prices

Historical stock prices

Provides historical price data for the provided companies or Market Indices (MASI and MADEX).

stock() stocks()

Stock prices

Moroccan Market Indices

Easy access to the full list of Moroccan Market and Sectoral Indices.

indices() sectoral_indices()

Moroccan Market and Sectoral indices

Moroccan Bonds

Comprehensive list of the available Moroccan Bonds.

bonds()

Moroccan Bonds

Important Notes:

  • The plural variations of the functions accept multiple arguments.
  • The names of the companies should be provided like they’re listed in the get_today output.
  • for stock and intraday providing no argument defaults to using MASI as one.
